'''Iter Ad Astra Abyssosque''' is an outdoor gift set favored by the companions: [[Bennett]], [[Qiqi]], [[Chongyun]], [[Fischl]], [[Albedo]] and [[Aloy]].

It is obtained from the [[Housing/Realm Depot|Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.
